bioAsHtml: Jean-Christophe Baillie started his career in Science at the Sony Computer Science Lab in Paris, and then founded Gostai in 2006, a startup in robotics & AI, which has been acquired by Aldebaran/Softbank in 2012. After two years at Aldebaran, where he created an AI Lab, he launched in 2014 Novaquark, developing Dual Universe: an ambitious project about virtual worlds where people will be able to recreate entire civilizations. Jean-Christophe is a graduate from Ecole Polytechnique, Paris, and received a PhD in Artificial Intelligence from Paris 6 University.

acceptedTalks.title: Dual Universe: Challenges techniques de la création d'un monde virtuel "single-shard" entièrement éditable
